Text: Personal Enemy is a play by John Osborne and Anthony Creighton.

2:
--------------------
Text: Personal Enemy:  It was thought that the play manuscript was lost, but copies were found (along with another early Osborne play, "The Devil Inside Him") in the Lord Chamberlain's archive in the British Library in 2008.
Triplets:<Personal Enemy
5:
--------------------
Text: Personal Enemy:  The play is the only work by Osborne to be set in the United States.
